did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: University of Arizona. Agricultural Extension Service.

did.abstract: Bound typescripts of agents reports, including photographs, charts, clippings, and examples of publications, 1948 to 1958.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: 4-H Club reports (AZ 303). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Cooperative project of the University of Arizona, College of Agriculture and the U.S. Dept. of Agriculture to encourage agriculture and home economics in Arizona.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized chronologically by county within fiscal year.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Bound typescripts of agents reports, including photographs, charts, clippings, and examples of publications, 1948 to 1958.

relatedmaterial.p: Related collections at AZ 298, AZ 301, AZ 302, AZ 304 through AZ 309.
Continued by AZ 304 University of Arizona, Agricultural Extension Service, Combined reports of the county, home, and 4-H club agents, 1958-1968.

item.corpname: University of Arizona. Agricultural Extension Service -- Records and correspondence.
